name: nfnt

body.origin:
|- wi(wnf(s0, w0), wnf(s0, wn(w0)))
-| wb(wnf(s0, w0), wnf(s0, wn(w0)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wnf(s0, w0), wnf(s0, wn(w0)))
-| wb(wnf(s0, w0), wnf(s0, wn(w0)))

comment: If a variable is non-free in a proposition, then it is non-free in its negation. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 24-Sep-2016.) (Proof shortened by Wolf Lammen, 28-Dec-2017.) (Revised by BJ, 24-Jul-2019.) ~ df-nf changed. (Revised by Wolf Lammen, 4-Oct-2021.)
